subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Wambach, the leading scorer in women’s soccer history, has blamed the field surface, but scoring has been a persistent problem for the U.S. team all year.
snippet: Wambach, the leading scorer in women’s soccer history, has blamed the field surface, but scoring has been a persistent problem for the U.S. team all year.
